txt.en: Dolgimil's stare sends a chill through your spine
Defeated Dolgimil's lieutenant ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'[placeholder], it is good to see you again. I am just about to head north to Erchar's encampment. I will give him the meeting place that Herion suggested.'

You ask where the meeting place is.

'I will let Herion tell you for it is not my place. We shall all return to Linhir together. For Gondor!'
Retribution at the Lighthouse

'It ends here, [placeholder]. I know not why you are in my presence and I do not care for it.

'The blood of Castamir runs through my brothers and I. This land is ours! I have claimed this once great beacon of Gondor as my throne. Look how easy it fell! Azruthor would have claimed Langstrand if it weren't for a band of warriors. I would very much like to kill those who took Azruthor's life.

'Azgarzôr and Balakhôr have their own thrones to claim. May Azgarzôr give me strength and Balakhôr guide me to victory!'
dnt
Speak with Herion at his encampment
Dolgimil steps out into the room and beckons you to speak with him

'Dolgimil destroyed Barad Rill and now resides within its ruins. Go quick and silent into the stronghold and put an end to Dolgimil's plans.

'I know not how guarded Barad Rill is, but I trust that you will make it through.

'I shall return to Herion with haste. We will defeat nearby scouts in Dor-en-Ernil to stop any additional enforcements from arriving at Barad Rill. I wish you luck my friend.'
Speak with Aras at Herion's encampment
Defeat Dolgimil's lieutenants ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Dolgimil's Corsair lieutenants ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Dolgimil has been defeated
Defeat Dolgimil's Haradrim lieutenant

'It ends here, [placeholder]. I know not why you are in my presence and I do not care for it.

'The blood of Castamir runs through my brothers and I. This land is ours! I have claimed this once great beacon of Gondor as my throne. Look how easy it fell! Azruthor would have claimed Langstrand if it weren't for a band of warriors. I would very much like to kill those who took Azruthor's life.

'Azgarzôr and Balakhôr have their own thrones to claim. May Azgarzôr give me strength and Balakhôr guide me to victory!'
Barad Rill is located at the southern tip of Dor-en-Ernil.\n\nEnter the stronghold at Barad Rill.
Now that Dolgimil has been located, Aras calls upon you to infiltrate Dolgimil's stronghold at Barad Rill and stop him before he sends forces to Linhir.
Dolgimil can be found somewhere in Barad Rill.\n\nSummon and confront Dolgimil.

'Ah, [placeholder], you have returned! You provided Gondor with light in these dark times. I am sure others will look up to you as much as I do now.

'While you were conquering the forces at Barad Rill, Aras and I managed to defeat a half-dozen scouts. A mere grain of sand next to your mountainous deeds. I suppose we all do our part in this conflict.

'We have dwelled here too long, my friend. The time has come to meet with my brother Erchar and return to Linhir.'
Summon and confront Dolgimil at Barad Rill
Dolgimil can be found somewhere in Barad Rill.\n\nConfront Dolgimil.
Herion can be found at his encampment in western Dor-en-Ernil.\n\nYou should speak with Herion.
Dolgimil's lieutenants can be found in the stronghold at Barad Rill.\n\nDefeat Dolgimil's lieutenants.
Defeated Dolgimil's lieutenant ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeated Dolgimil's lieutenant
Aras can be found at encampment in western Dor-en-Ernil.\n\nYou should speak with Aras.
Enter the stronghold at Barad Rill
Defeat Dolgimil's lieutenants ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You enter the heavily guarded grounds of a once great lighthouse
Dolgimil has been defeated
